channel.title: Travel on Nomadic Method
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Nomadic Method

item.title: Best Travel Backpacks of 2019
item.description: As more adventurers hit the road for traveling, the more options we have for luggage.

item.title: Ultimate Travel Packing List
item.description: Trying to decide what to bring abroad and how to pack for traveling long-term can be difficult.

item.title: 5 Ways to Reduce Your Environmental Impact While Traveling
item.description: The luxury of travel is becoming more available. Flights are getting cheaper, rideshare apps compete for your attention, and transportation alternatives are plentiful.

item.title: Guide to Choosing the Best Banks for Travel
item.description: With over hundreds of options in choosing bank accounts, making a decision can be daunting.
